widget.header: Vasu Chatted About Justia With Prashanth Shenoy

config: In a recent meeting in Mangaluru, Vasu Kappettu spoke with Prashanth Shenoy Katpady, the CTO and Co-founder of UniCourt. They discussed Justia's impressive evolution into the most visited legal website in the United States. Vasu Kappettu expounded on the vital contribution of the Justia Team in reaching this milestone by providing free and public access to legal information. Furthermore, Vasu delved into the strategies and initiatives that have elevated Justia.com to the forefront of online legal resources. The discussion evolved into a meaningful exchange that underscored the crucial intersection between legal technology and accessibility.
You can watch the full interview here
